body.p: Paragraph 5 of this Interpretation specifies that infrastructure is within the scope of the Interpretation when the following conditions apply:

li.p: the grantor controls or regulates what services the operator must provide with the infrastructure, to whom it must provide them, and at what price; and
the grantor controls—through ownership, beneficial entitlement or otherwise—any significant residual interest in the infrastructure at the end of the term of the arrangement.
